headline: Attorney General Josh Shapiro makes campaign stop in Erie
author: Brian Wilk
sentences:

Supply chain issues, the war in Ukraine and how that’s disrupted global marketplaces, including the oil and gas marketplace,” said Josh Shapiro, Pennsylvania Attorney General.
“He wanted to get his message out in a middle class neighborhood and I said there’s no better place to do that than my house,” said Pat Harkins (D) PA State Representative.

Expanding the property tax and rent rebate program
Sending a gas tax refund to Pennsylvania drivers.
Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro made a pit stop in Erie on Friday as he looked to become the state’s next governor.
